message: Hello?
Hello, how can I help you today?
Yes, I need to sort out the vehicle tax for my car.
Okay, no problem. What seems to be the issue with the vehicle tax?
Well, I received a letter saying my tax was due for renewal, but the car hasn't been on the road for over a year now.
I see. So you'll need to declare a Statutory Off Road Notification then.
A what? Sorn?
Yes, that's right - a SORN, which stands for Statutory Off Road Notification.
Oh right. And how do I go about doing that?
To declare a SORN, you'll need to go on the gov.uk website or give us a call.
Alright, well I've called you now, so can we just do it over the phone?
Yes, of course. I'll need to take some details from you first. Do you have the vehicle registration document, or log book, to hand?
Yeah I've got it here.
Great. Can you confirm the registration number on the document for me please?
PN57 ABC
Sorry, could you repeat that? I didn't quite catch the full registration.
It's, uh, PN57 ABX
PN57 ABX. Got it, thank you.
And what is the make and model of the vehicle?
It's a Ford Fiesta.
Okay, and the color?
Red.
Got it. One moment while I pull up the details.
Alright, I have the Ford Fiesta registered PN57 ABX coming up.
That's the one.
Okay, to confirm, you are looking to declare a Statutory Off Road Notification, or SORN, for this vehicle?
Yes that's right. It's been sat idle in my garage for well over a year now.
No problem at all. Just to make you aware, when you declare SORN it means the vehicle cannot be used or kept on public roads until you tax it again.
Yeah yeah, I understand.
Okay great. I'll go ahead and process the SORN declaration for you now. Can I take your full name and current address please, to tie to the vehicle record?
It's james jones. 24 Acacia Avenue...Newtown...AB12 3CD.
Thanks James. And can you confirm the reference number printed at the top of the log book please?
Got it. I'll make a note that you read that out to me.
Okay, I've processed the SORN declaration now. You'll receive confirmation through the post within the next week.
A whole week?? That's a long time.
Yes, I'm afraid that's the standard timescale for the SORN paperwork to arrive by mail.
Oh for...this is ridiculous. Why can't you just email me or something? It's 2024!
I understand your frustration sir, but those are the procedures we have to follow. I don't have any way to send digital confirmations.
This is absolutely absurd! How outdated can you get?
Sir, I'm just following the DVLA's policies and processes here.
Yeah well your policies stink! You idiots are stuck in the 1900s!
I apologize for the inconvenience but there's no need for insults. I've made the SORN declaration for you as required.
Whatever. What a total waste of my time. Useless!
I'm sorry you feel that way sir. Is there anything else I can assist with today?
No! You've done enough damage already.
